displayName.description: The Dataflow display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.

description.description: The Dataflow description. Maximum length is 256 characters.

folderId.description: The folder ID. If not specified or null, the Dataflow is created with the workspace as its folder.

UpdateDataflowDefinitionRequest.description: Update Dataflow public definition request payload.

DataflowDefinition.description: Dataflow public definition object. Refer to this [article](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/dataflow-definition) for more details on how to craft a Dataflow public definition.

path.description: The Dataflow public definition part path.

payload.description: The Dataflow public definition part payload.

displayName.description: The Dataflow display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.

description.description: The Dataflow description. Maximum length is 256 characters.

CreateDataflowExecuteScheduleRequest.description: Create dataflow execute schedule plan request payload.

CreateDataflowApplyChangesScheduleReques.description: Create dataflow apply changes schedule plan request payload.

RunOnDemandDataflowExecuteJobRequest.description: Run on demand execute dataflow job instance payload

executionData.description: Payload for run on-demand execute job request. Needed only if the dataflow has parameterization enabled.

DataflowExecutionPayload.description: The execution data payload for Dataflow

executeOption.description: Options to run the execute operation. Additional executeOptions may be added over time.

values.description: Default Value. Apply Changes operation is skipped.
Appply Changes operation is done if needed. Can be used when the latest changes are required for Execute.

parameters.description: A list of parameters to override during execution.

value.description: A list of parameters defined in the Dataflow.

DataflowParameter.description: Base type for a Dataflow parameter that contains the corresponding properties for all parameters.

isRequired.description: Indicates whether the parameter is required.

type.description: The type of the parameter. Additional type types may be added over time.

values.description: The parameter value is of type string.
The parameter value is of type boolean.
The parameter value is of type long.
The parameter value is of type double.
The parameter value is of type DateTime. The time is in UTC, using the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ format.
The parameter value is of type DateTimeZone. String in the format `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:sszzz`.
The parameter value is of type Date. String in the format `yyyy-MM-dd`.
The parameter value is of type Time. String in the format `HH:mm:ss`.
The parameter value is of type Duration. String in the format `\Pd\DTH\Hm\Ms\S`.

DataflowStringParameter.description: A Dataflow parameter of type String.

defaultValue.description: The value with which the parameter will be refreshed if none is provided when executing the dataflow .

DataflowBooleanParameter.description: A Dataflow parameter of type Boolean.

defaultValue.description: The value with which the parameter will be refreshed if none is provided when executing the dataflow.

DataflowIntegerParameter.description: A Dataflow parameter of type Long.

defaultValue.description: The value with which the parameter will be refreshed if none is provided when executing the dataflow.

DataflowNumberParameter.description: A Dataflow parameter of type double.

defaultValue.description: The value with which the parameter will be refreshed if none is provided when executing the dataflow.

DataflowDateTimeParameter.description: A Dataflow parameter of type DateTime. String in the format `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.xxxZ` (Example: `2025-09-15T21:45:00.000Z`).

defaultValue.description: The value with which the parameter will be refreshed if none is provided when executing the dataflow.

DataflowDateTimeZoneParameter.description: A Dataflow parameter of type DateTimeZone. String in the format `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:sszzz` (Example: `2025-09-15T21:45:00+02:00`). Use "Automatic" type to override this type of parameter when executing the dataflow.

defaultValue.description: The value with which the parameter will be refreshed if none is provided when executing the dataflow.

DataflowDateParameter.description: A Dataflow parameter of type Date. String in the format `yyyy-MM-dd` (Example: `2025-09-15` for the date Sep 15, 2025). Use "Automatic" type to override this type of parameter when executing the dataflow.

defaultValue.description: The value with which the parameter will be refreshed if none is provided when executing the dataflow.

DataflowTimeParameter.description: A Dataflow parameter of type Time. String in the format `HH:mm:ss` (Example: `21:45:00` for 9:45 PM). Use "Automatic" type to override this type of parameter when executing the dataflow.

defaultValue.description: The value with which the parameter will be refreshed if none is provided when executing the dataflow.

DataflowDurationParameter.description: A Dataflow parameter of type Duration. String in the format `\Pd\DTH\Hm\Ms\S` (Example: `P5DT14H35M30S` for 5 days, 14 hours, 35 minutes and 30 seconds). Use "Automatic" type to override this type of parameter when executing the dataflow.

defaultValue.description: The value with which the parameter will be refreshed if none is provided when executing the dataflow.
